data.eml:eml: On the diversity of the genus Pisione (Polychaeta, Pisionidae) along the Portuguese continental shelf, with a key to European species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martins, Roberto, Martín, Guillermo San, Rodrigues, Ana Maria, Quintino, Victor (2012): On the diversity of the genus Pisione (Polychaeta, Pisionidae) along the Portuguese continental shelf, with a key to European species. Zootaxa 3450: 12-22, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.208487
